content: it failed. because of problems in the java build code.

see this PR: https://github.com/HL7/kindling/pull/41

that fails R4B. I'm going to accept a bunch of PRs across java + R5 and R4B and then clean up the mess. In a few days time, I'm going to re-organise the source; you should all pause while I do that

Grahame Grieve said:

...In a few days time, I'm going to re-organise the source; you should all pause while I do that

Just following up to see if we are good to un-pause changes yet. Thanks!
oh I ran into all sorts of difficulties, and I'm still a few days away
No worries, just didn't want to start making changes if you were still working on it. Thanks!
